https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/mdnZmZkyUWNqk9mDsvW9l0YW4TO.jpg Documentary about the tragedy which struck the Welsh mining village of Aberfan in 1966, when a mountain of coal slurry engulfed a school, claiming 144 lives, many of them children. Aberfan: The Untold Story
